info.title: Dokobit Portal
info.description: Use Dokobit portal with all the features that it has but make it automated so that you don't have to waste your time on the administrative job. Put together an automated document signing process puzzle from only the parts you need: signing, sharing, downloading or deleting documents, removing and replacing signers, getting details about signers and signature information.

post.description: Create a PDF, ASIC or ADOC file for signing.

postback_url.description: URL of your system to handle webhooks

hard_deadline.description: If set to `true` participants wonâ€™t be able to sign or approve this document after set `deadline`. Default: `false`

require_qualified_signatures.description: Allow to sign only with qualified signatures. Default: `false`

allow_video_identification.description: Allow to sign using video-based identification. Default: `false`

annotation_position.description: You can choose the position of signature annotations on a PDF document. Default: `first_top`

annotation_personal_code.description: If set to `true` personal code will be visible in annotation. Only applicable for pdf type signing. Default: `false`

require_account.description: Require user to have a Dokobit account before signing. Default: `true`

files.description: File or files to be signed

country_code.description: Participant's country code. Required if personal code is provided

sequence.description: Allows setting up the sequence order of document approving and signing actions

get.description: Returns a list of all documents available to the account owner.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter documents by status. Possible values: `completed`, `pending` or `declined`

parameters.name: date_from
parameters.description: Filter signings which were created on or after this date (Example: 2022-01-01)

parameters.name: date_to
parameters.description: Filter signings which were created on or before this date (Example: 2022-01-31)

get.description: Returns document's information with signing status.

post.description: Allows to send a reminder e-mail for participant, only if person has not signed document yet.
Indicated participants will gain access to the document with the selected role.
Document will be sealed with your organizations' electronic seal. Please contact our support at developers@dokobit.com to get a qualified certificate for e-sealing.
Access to the document will be revoked for the indicated participant.
The document will be removed from the owner's account. It will remain accessible to other participants.
The document will be removed from the owner's account and from other participants' who haven't signed the document yet.
Allows to update attributes of an existing document signing.

post.description: Dokobit is an eIDAS-certified service provider for qualified e-signature and e-seal validations. Use this action to upload a signed file for validation. Supported file types: `.asice` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.asics` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-s+zip|`.sce` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.bdoc` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.edoc` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.pdf` - application/pdf|`.p7s` - application/pkcs7-signature|`.xml` - application/xml
